functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Pewter Tonic","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"A powerful brew distilled from withered flesh.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:5,Amplifier:0b,Duration:4800},{Id:11,Amplifier:0b,Duration:4800},{Id:17,Amplifier:0b,Duration:4800}],Potion:"minecraft:strength",CustomPotionColor:11752018}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Phantom Menace","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Distilled from tears of unborn children.","italic":true}','{"text":"Best served cold.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:1,Amplifier:2b,Duration:9600},{Id:3,Amplifier:1b,Duration:9600},{Id:18,Amplifier:1b,Duration:9600}],Potion:"minecraft:swiftness",CustomPotionColor:2163727}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Addicting Beer","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Common beer with a touch of opioids.","italic":true}','{"text":"Keeps villagers at bay.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:2,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:4,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:11,Amplifier:3b,Duration:4800},{Id:18,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800}],Potion:"minecraft:weakness",CustomPotionColor:16773151}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Kayra\'s Curse","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Distilled from boiled frog legs and enhanced by the occult.","italic":true}','{"text":"Nobody shall build a fortress higher than a man\'s step.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:8,Amplifier:80b,Duration:400},{Id:28,Amplifier:0b,Duration:4800}],Potion:"minecraft:weakness",CustomPotionColor:6519211}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Black Hole in a Bottle","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Particles of this brew seem to attract","italic":true}','{"text":"and asimilate nearby objects.","italic":true}','{"text":"Its name is purely metaphorical.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:2,Amplifier:4b,Duration:1200},{Id:6,Amplifier:3b,Duration:0},{Id:7,Amplifier:3b,Duration:0},{Id:19,Amplifier:8b,Duration:1200},{Id:20,Amplifier:8b,Duration:1200}],Potion:"minecraft:harming",CustomPotionColor:0}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Will O\' The Beer","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Some people describe its effects","italic":true}','{"text":"as incredibly light and liberating.","italic":true}','{"text":"But captives always spill out the","italic":true}','{"text":"truth when they\'re high enough.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:25,Amplifier:1b,Duration:9600}],Potion:"minecraft:harming",CustomPotionColor:0}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Living Sponge","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Microscopic sponge particles","italic":true}','{"text":"used to keep the breath.","italic":true}','{"text":"Despite all reports of whispers and","italic":true}','{"text":"intrusive thoughts, they should be","italic":true}','{"text":"regarded as harmless.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:13,Amplifier:0b,Duration:18000}],Potion:"minecraft:harming",CustomPotionColor:16776960}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Beer","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"True beer. Really, just beer.","italic":true}','{"text":"Beer beer beer beer.","obfuscated":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:2,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:3,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:9,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:15,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:17,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800},{Id:18,Amplifier:2b,Duration:4800}],Potion:"minecraft:strength",CustomPotionColor:16776960}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Thick Serum","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Distilled from magma cubes and freshly","italic":true}','{"text":"harvested froglights.","italic":true}','{"text":"Increases resistance during hot situations.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:12,Amplifier:1b,Duration:18000}],Potion:"minecraft:strength",CustomPotionColor:16711680}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Imported Liquid Emeralds","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Subjects can feel the thrill of business","italic":true}','{"text":"running through their veins.","italic":true}','{"text":"Proyective techniques reveal","italic":true}','{"text":"temporary psychopatic tendencies.","italic":true}','{"text":"Note: supplier has since cut contact.","italic":true}']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:32,Amplifier:1b,Duration:18000}],Potion:"minecraft:strength",CustomPotionColor:7798597}
